name: ebstv worldwide
description:
EBS TV is a privately held media company established in 2008 in Silver Spring, MD, USA to provide a niche transmission programming that targets the booming Ethiopian market globally. Since its formation EBS has been, and still is, providing its media to subscribers interested to access programming of Ethiopian history, culture lifestyle, sports, entertainment, tourism, and business.
EBS TV aims to promote Ethiopian and other African countries values, cultures and traditions globally. The much-needed information provided by EBS TV would help bridge the cultural divide and narrow the communication gap for Ethiopians residing in North America and around the world. EBS TV also envisions providing programs pertaining to the rich cultural heritage of Ethiopia, its history, tradition, socio-economic development, business, tourism and current affairs.

For More information on the EBS TV
EBS TV / Ethiopian Broadcasting Service

info@ebstv.tv
www.ebstv.tv

name: Andafta
description:
Andafta is an Ethiopian multi-platform news, entertainment, and media company. We are powered by our own proprietary technology, and we are the go-to source for news, politics, talk shows, social issues, digital culture, and entertainment content for our dedicated and influential audience around the nation and the globe.

Our mission is to provide our audience with high-quality, informative, and engaging content that reflects the diversity of Ethiopia and the world. We believe that everyone deserves to have access to accurate and unbiased information, and we are committed to providing that information in a way that is both entertaining and informative.

We are always looking for new ways to improve our content, and we welcome your feedback. If you have any suggestions for how we can make our channel better, please feel free to let us know.

Thank you for watching Andafta!

name: Teddy Afro
description:
Welcome to the official Teddy Afro YouTube channel. 

Tewodros Kassahun, better known by his stage name of Teddy Afro, is an iconic Ethiopian pop star who has dominated the national music scene for the last decade and a half.

Since signing with an Ethiopian record label in 2001, the Ethiopian music icon officially released albums are: Abugida (2001), Yasteseryal (2005), Yasteseryal Edition 2 (2005), Tikur Sew (2012) and Ethiopia (2017). His last album Ethiopia, became the most selling album of all times selling 600,000 copies on the day it was released. The album was also on top of billboard’s world music chart, #1 on CDBaby and Itunes album sells, which made it the first album in the nations history.                      

Enjoy! Subscribe!
Connect with us for more. 
https://www.facebook.com/TeddyAfroMusic/
https://www.instagram.com/teddyafromuzika/
https://twitter.com/teddyafromuzika

name: Sodere TV
description:
Sodere is Santa Monica, California and Addis Ababa based Ethiopian media, entertainment and ecommerce company. 
Sodere broadcast content via satellite television channel and stream via website and applications.
Sodere produces original Ethiopian movies, drama, sitcom and music clips. 
We also broadcast entertainment and film premiere videos recorded and edited in our studio.
Sodere distribute news, movies and other content on website and mobile apps to more than 5 million Ethiopians who live in and outside Ethiopia. 
Most of our viewers are from US, Canada, UK, Ethiopia and Scandinavian countries.
Sodere content are available on Sodere.com, Apple Store, Google Play, Samsung TV, Apple TV and Roku TV

name: Memeher Dr Zebene Lemma
description:
በስመ አብ ወወልድ ወመንፈስ ቅዱስ አሐዱ አምላክ አሜን።

የአብ ጸጋ የወልድ ቸርነት የመንፈሰ ቅዱስ ሕብረት አንድነት የእመቤታችን ምልጃ ከሁላችን ጋራ ይሁን።
ባላችሁበት ሁሉ ሰላመ እግዚአብሔር አይለያችሁ። አገራችንንም አለማችንንም ሰላም ያድርግልን።

ይህንን የዩቱብ ቻናል ለምትከታተሉ ሁሉ፡-
Memeher Dr Zebene Lemma በሚለው በዚህ ቻናል ላይ፡-

የኢትዮጵያ ኦርቶዶክስ ቤተ ክርስቲያን እምነትና ስርዓት ትምህርት ይሰጥበታል
የኢትዮጵያ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ታሪክ ይነገርበታል  
ትምህርተ ሃይማኖት፣ ነገረ ቅዱሳን ይሰበክበታል 
የመንፈሳዊ እድገት፣ ግብረገብነትና ስነምግባር ትምህርትና ምክር ይሰጥበታል 
እንዲሁም የኦርቶዶክስ ተዋህዶ ምሥጢር ይፈተትበታል።

በተለያዩ አርስተ ጉዳዮች ላይ:-
 
መንፈሳዊ እድገታችንን ከፍ ሊያደርጉ 
ተዋህዶ ሃይማኖታችንን ሊጠብቁ 
አልፎም አገራችን ኢትዮጵያን የበረከት ምድር ሊያደርጉ የሚችሉ መንፈሳዊ ትምህርቶች ታገኙበታላችሁ።
 
ስለዚህ 
ሰብስክራብ በማድረግ የደዉሉንም ምልክት በመጫን
 
በየእለቱ የሚሰጠው ትምህርት እንዲደርሳችሁ ማድረግ ትችላላችሁ።
ለሌሎች ወዳጅ ዘመዶችም በመንገርና በማካፈል ሁላችንም መንፈሳዊ ግዴታችንን እንድንወጣ በእግዚአብሔር ስም እንገልጻለን እንጋብዛለን።

የእግዚአብሔር ሰላም ከሁላችህን ጋር ይሁን።

Memeher Dr Zebene Lemma የሚለውን የዩቱብ ቻናል ሰብስክራብ በማድረግ ከእግዚአብሔር ጋር የሚያገናኙ መንፈሳዊ ትምህርቶች ማግኝት ይችላሉ።
የፌስቡክ ገጻችንንም ይጎብኙ ፎልሎውም ያድርጉን፡- https://www.facebook.com/MemeherDrZebeneLemma

ሰላም ለዓለም ሁሉ ይሁንልን አሜን!

name: Abol TV
description:
የኤምኔት አዲሱ  ቻናል አቦል ቲቪ  ዲኤስቲቪን ሊቀላቀል ነው ።

 ይህ የቴሌቪዥን ቻናል  ልዩ እና   ለኢትዮጵያዊ ታዳሚዎች  የሚቀርብ ነው። በብዙ ሚሊዮን ኢንቨስትመንት በምስራቅ አፍሪካ ባሉ ሀገራት በማሽያ ማጂክ ቦንጎ (ታንዛንያ)፣ ማሽያ ማጂክ ምስራቅ (ኬንያ)፣ ማሺያ ማጂክ ፕላስ (ኬንያ)፣ ፐርል ማጂክ (ዩጋንዳ)፣ እና ፐርል ማጂክ ፕራይም (ዩጋንዳ)፣ ያዘጋጀዉን  ኤምኔት አዲሱን እና አዝናኝ የሆነዉን አቦል ቲቪን ለማካተት ዝግጅቱን አጠናቋል።

በዚህ ቻናል ተመልካች የሚፈልገው ተከታታይ ድራማ፣አዝናኝ የህጻናት ዝግጅቶች፣ ሙዚቃ  እና ሌሎችም ይገኙበታል። አቦል ቲቪን በዲኤስቲቪ  ቻናል ቁጥር 146 ላይ ብቻ የሚገኝ ይሆናል።

name: Abby Lakew
description:
Welcome to the official Abby Lakew Ethiopian Music YouTube channel. 

Abby Lakew, is an African Grammy Award nominated singer songwriter and actress from Ethiopia and she was born in Gonder, Ethiopia. 

In 2007 she released her debut studio album ''Manale''. Which featured both English, amharic songs, Ethiopian traditional and dance music and was a reflection of her two identities – Ethiopian and American.

In 2012 she released a new single Shikorina followed by Endemewadeh, 2014 Abererew, 2015 the smash hit Yene Habesha and 2016 Befikir Eskista. 

In 2012 she landed the leading role in a critically acclaimed Ethiopian movie called Eyerus.

In September 2017 she released her second studio album ''Yene Habesha''.

In September 2020 she released a new single Messay.

In May 2022 she released her new single Gondere Wa.

description:

ራኬብ አለማየሁ ነኝ! ይህ የዩቲብ ቻናል በቢዝነስ ሃሳቦችና ቲፕስ፣ በጠንካራ ቃለመጠይቆች፣ ወቅታዊ መረጃዎች፣ አነቃቂ ንግግሮች፣ ሲትኮም፣ አዝናኝ ጨዋታዎች፣ መዝናኛ እና የተለያዩ ዝግጅቶች ወደ እናንተ የሚደርሱበት ቻናል ነው፡፡ በዚህ ቻናል የማይዳሰስ የማይነካ ምንም ጉዳይ አይኖርም፣ ከእናንተ ወገኖቼ ጋር ሃሳቦችን የምለዋወጥበት የምወያይበትና ለጋራ እድገታችን የምንማከርበት መድረክ ነው፡፡

ይህ ቻናል እናንተን በመላው አለም የምትገኙ ወገኖቼን ከማዝናናት ባለፈ በኑሯችሁ ወደተሻለ ስኬት እንድትደርሱ፣ በቢዝነሱ ዓለም እንድትሰማሩ መረጃ የሚሰጥና ስራ ፈጣሪ እንድትሆኑ የሚያበረታታ እንዲሁም እድሎችን የሚያመላክት፣ ድልድይ ሊሆን የተጀመረ ነው፡፡  የዚህ ቻናል ተከታታዮች ስትሆኑ በራስ ሰርቶ መለወጥን ፣ ስራ ፈጣሪነትን፣ መረጃን ሳቅና ቁምነገርን ታገኛላችሁ፣ እውቀት ስንገነባ የተሻለ ነገ ይኖረናል!

name: Hiwet Mamo
description: My name is Hiwet Mamo and I teach kids how to play Piano and other musical instruments. I also develop audio/ video contents to help children educate using music as a tool.  . The contents in my YouTube channel help children with special needs  to develop motor skill and mental development. Children learn language, Maths, Science and other subjects easily through music and visual contents. I also work on to  help maintain our cultural and traditional values pass over to next generation via music.  My channel helps to educate and entertain Ethiopian children. Most Ethiopian kids do not have access to this kind of contents and my channel is intended and currently being used by many marginalized children and women in urban and rural areas across Ethiopia. The purpose is to create access and educate.

name: Sheger FM 102.1 Radio
description:
#ShegerFM #Ethiopia #ሸገርኤፍኤም102.1

Sheger  FM 102.1 'Yenanetew Radio' is the first private radio station in Ethiopia on air since October 4,2007. We are proud to be Ethiopians and we love our country more than anything! Hear us live on http://www.ShegerFM.com 

 ሬዲዮ መስከረም 23፣2000 ዓ.ም ሥራ የጀመረ የመጀመሪያው የኢትዮጵያ የግል ኤፍ ኤም ሬዲዮ ጣቢያ ነው፡፡ይህ ከአዲስ አበባ በ250 ኪሎ ሜትር ክበብ ውስጥ መሰናዶውን እንዲያሰራጭ ፈቃድ አግኝቶ የረጅም ጊዜ የሬዲዮ ሥራ ልምድ ባላቸው ባለሙያዎች የተቋቋመው ሸገር ኤፍ ኤም 102.1 ሬዲዮ በአጭር ጊዜ ውስጥ በአድማጮች ዘንድ ተወዳጅነትን ሊያተርፍ ችሏል፡፡

ሸገር 102.1 አዲስ የሬዲዮ አቀራረብ መላና አዲስ ቃና ይዞ የቀረበ በሀገሪቱ የሚዲያ ገበያ ላይ መሪ ሚና የሚጫወት ጣቢያ ነው፡፡ የሸገር ዓላማ ከወገናዊነት የነፃ ትክክለኛ የሕዝብ ድምፅ መሆን፣ ሥነ ምግባርን የጠበቀ የጋዜጠኝነት መርህን መከተልና የተሣካለት የኢንፎቴይመንት (Information & Entertainment) ሬዲዮ ጣቢያ መሆን ነው፡፡

ጣቢያችን ለማንም ባለመወገን ለሁሉም በታማኝነትና በመልካም ሥነ ምግባር መልካም አገልግሎት በመስጠት የሚያምንና ለእነዚህም እሴቶች ትልቅ ክብር የሚሰጥ ሬዲዮ ጣቢያ ነው፡፡

ሁሌም ከሸገር ጋር ሁኑ
ሸገር የእናንተ ነው!
ኢትዮጵያ ለዘላለም ትኑር!

ከዚህም ባለፈ በየሞያ ዘርፋቸው የሚሰሩለትን ማህበረሰብ ከማገልገል በላይ ለብዙሃኑ አርአያ መሆን የቻሉ ባለውለታዎችን የሞያ ዘርፍ ሳያግደን እናመሰግናለን፣እዘክራለን እንዲሁም እናከብራለን።
ከፊልም፣ከሙዚቃ፣ ከፕራንክ እና ከተያያዥ የጥበብ ስራዎች በተጨማሪም በአዕምሮ ህመም ዙሪያ የግንዛቤ ማስጨበጫ ስራዎችን በመስራት ማህበራዊ ሃላፊነትን በመወጣት ላይ ይገኛል።

name: TechTalkWithSolomon
description:
TechTalk With Solomon weekly technology TV show on EBS embarks on informing its target audience with useful and most up-to-date science & technology topics - computers, robotics, personal electronics, new innovations, medical technology, space science just to name a few. This show strives to address critical matters in the technology realm and bridge the huge information gap between the developed and the developing nations by bringing a new kind of TV program that can engage, educate, empower its viewers.

Solomon Kassa is an award-winning producer and host of the show. He also currently works as a senior IT consultant in one of the most respected Global Firm (fortune 500 company) in the United States. He holds a Bachelor of Science degree in computer programming and Master of Science degree in Information systems Technology from The George Washington University, a well-respected higher education institution in the United States.

👉 አሳሽ ዴይሊ ይህንን ክፍተት ለመድፈን ብቅ ያለች የእውቀት መረጃ ሙዳይ ነች- ቀረብ ብለው ሙዳያን በመክፈት ከእውቀት መረጃ ማእድ በመቌዳስ ህይወቶን ይመግቡ፡

በማሕበራዊ ህይወት የአትኩሮት ኮምፓሷን በማነጣጠር- በቴክኖልጂ በስነ ጠፈር ምርምር በስነ ህይወት በቴክኖልጂ Information Technology በስነ ጠፈር ምርምርና ግኝት Cosmology እና በSpace Technology እንዲሁም በስነ ህይወት The Law of Nature እና ስለምንኖርበት ዓለምና ክፍላተ ዓለም Universe አዳዲስ ሳይንሳዊ ግኝቶችን ጥልቅ የምርምር ዘገባዎችን ለእናንት በሚመጥን መልኩ በመስኩ ልምድና እውቀት ባካበቱ ጸሐፊያን እያዘጋጀን የምናቀርብበት ልዩ ቻናል ነው።
👉 በአሳሽ ዴይሊ ከዓለም ምስጢራት እስከ የዩንቨርሱ ግዙፍ ገጽታ፣ ከዩፎዎች ጥናቴዊ ዘገባ እስከ የእለት ተእለት ህይወታችንን አቅጣጫ አስያዥና አቅጣጫ ጠቃሚ የስነ ልቡና የስነ ህይወት የስነ አእምሮ ምሁራዊ ግኝቶችን ጥናቶችን እየመራረጥን የምናቀርብበት ከአስደናቂ የታሪክ ውቅያኖስ ጨለፍ አድርገን......

name: Aster Aweke
description:
For more than 30 years, singer/songwriter Aster Aweke has been entertaining audiences across the globe. Her songs have become anthems to her fans in Ethiopia, as well as to Ethiopians living abroad, and she continues to win the hearts and minds of world music lovers. "Ewedihalehu" (I Love You), her 24th album, was produced with her longtime arranger, Abegasu Kibrework Shiota, and also features the work of exciting new music producers, Henock Negash, and Maru. This electrifying album is sure to delight long-time and new fans alike.

With the release of her many albums – including Aster, Kabu, Ebo, Aster Aweke Live in London, Hagerë, Sugar, Aster’s Ballads, Fikir, and Checheho – Aster has topped both the Billboard and College Music Journal’s (CMJ) specialist charts. Kabu reached and remained at the #1 position for four weeks on the CMJ New World music chart and was in the Top 10 for five consecutive charts (10 weeks) on Billboard’s World Music chart.

name: MO'AA TV
description:
Background Mo’aa is a television private broadcasting company. It is owned by Leadstar Media P.L.C. and licensed under the registration number KK/AA/1/0009407/2008 in the Ministry of Trade and Industry. 

Although preliminary discussion about the need to establish a television cable network began earlier, testing transmission started on December 14, 2016. After months of testing, Mo’aa started its actual regular transmission on April 16, 2017 – the Ethiopian Eastern day. Despite its short time preparation intervals from conceptualization to realization, it has become a media house that is being followed by millions in Ethiopia and beyond.

Afan Oromo is the media’s main medium of transmission. Speakers of this language are the direct audience of the television. Generally, its reach in content is holistic in which the central message focuses on the great commission – preaching and teaching the Gospel of Christ.

name: ASRAT MEDIA
description:
Amhara Satellite Radio And Television Media House (ASRAT)

ASRAT is here to provide fair and unbiased information to its people.
The primary objectives and purposes of ASRAT media is 
To report on news-worthy events of the Amhara in particular and of Ethiopia in general; to promote the history, identity, and culture of the Amhara people; to  provide platform for Amhara focused organizations to express their views, debate those views openly, and respond to questions from the Amhara people regarding those views; to report on discussions and meetings of the Amhara people in particular and Ethiopians in general as well as organizations and parties focused on the Amhara and Ethiopians; to report, document, and disseminate the inhumane treatments the Amhara people suffer under any circumstance to the Amhara people, to Ethiopians and to the international bodies.

description:
Welcome to YeMiten Recipe Tube, a YouTube channel dedicated to inspiring viewers to incorporate cooking into their daily routines. Our creator grew up in Ethiopia surrounded by diverse flavors and believes that cooking is not just a way to nourish the body, but also a form of art and expression.

At YeMiten Recipe Tube, we provide step-by-step guidance, motivation, and practical tips to make cooking accessible and enjoyable for everyone. Our focus is on healthy eating, elevating culinary skills, and nourishing the body and soul.

Cooking can help you connect with your creativity, reduce stress, and promote mindfulness. Contact us at info@yemiten.com or visit our website at www.yemiten.com to learn more about collaboration or partnership opportunities.

Subscribe to our channel to embark on a culinary adventure that empowers you to cook and live a healthier life. Join us now and let's cook up a storm together!

description:
Welcome to Mehal Meda’s YouTube channel! “Mehal Meda” is an Amharic phrase, which, in essence, means a “central venue”. This channel is dedicated to provide a platform where various perspectives are reflected on current, past, and future social, political, scientific, religious, economic, health, legal, historical, and cultural events and phenomena that affect East Africa; especially, our beloved homeland, Ethiopia, and her twin, sovereign and independent sister-nation, Eritrea.
Mehal Meda encourages civil, respectful, positive discourses and discussions as it serves as a venue for peoples of Ethiopian and Eritrean origins to share their opinions, frustrations, concerns, expectations, life-experiences, aspirations, hopes, and dreams.
Mehal Meda does not offer any professional advise, nor does it make claims of expertise in any general or particular area.
Disclaimer: Mehal Meda often refers to and uses materials and clips from various media, including, audio and videos of interviews, n

name: Ras-Samuel
description:
Ras-Samuel Welda’abzgi
Actor | Writer | Filmmaker
Ras-Samuel is an Actor, Writer and a vessel for telling stories that are gifted to him, and he is on a mission to share those gifts with the world.

He became an actor, writer to tell BIPOC stories in a creative landscape and on-screen because as a young African/Australian creative he always noticed the great inequality in terms of representation. He has worked as a consultant for an upcoming Netflix series. Ras-Samuel wrote, Produced and Starred in The Last supper, BLVCK GOLD, Found in a dream and Jebena Genie.  He appeared in Neighbors, Throbbin 84, Westermark effect and the Short film Breath

Ras-Samuel hopes to diversify Australia’s artistic landscape by inspiring the next generation who might not see many culturally diverse artists like him on stage and on screen.

Follow me on the socials

description:
ይህ - ኦፊሴላዊ የተጅዊድ በአማርኛ የዩቱዩብ ቻናል ሲሆን  የአሏህን ሱብሐነሁ ወተዓላ ንግግር የሆነውን ቁርኣን በትክክል ለማንበብ እና ለመረዳት የተለያዩ ዝግጅቶችን በአማርኛ ቋንቋ ለተመልካቾች የሚያቀርብ ቻናል ነው። 
___________
በተለይ ቁርኣንን በጥሩ ሁኔታ ለማንበብ እና በተጅዊድ ትምህርት ዙሪያ ጥሩ እውቀትን ለማግኘት ቻናሉን ሰብስክራይብ በማድረግ እንድትከታተሉት እናስገነዝባለን።  
___________ 
عن عثمان بن عفان -رضي الله عنه- عن النبي -صلى الله عليه وسلم- قال
 «خَيرُكُم من تعلَّمَ القرآنَ وعلَّمَهُ»

name: New Creation Church Ethiopia
description:
New Creation International Church is founded by Apostle Japi (Bisrat Bezuayene), one of the great teacher of this generation, New Creation International Church(NCIC), Addis Ababa is an Independent Church. New Creation International Church (NCIC) began in the early 2013 by Apostle Japi (Bisrat Bezuayene)  and a friend for a prayer.

Right from the very early days of his ministry, the congregation increased in numbers exponentially in short period. Increased attendance few months into its founding made it necessary to move to a larger hall, so the group began meeting on the premises of Ethiopian worker's association(EWA) building located near Meskel Square on bole road.

name: Ambassel Tube
description:
Ambassel Records was founded by Fekadu Wari Gerbi in Addis Abeba Ethiopia in 1976. Ambassel Music and Film Producer P.L.C is a production and record label company known for recording and distributing quality and variety records and productions in Ethiopia and the rest of the world. 

We pride ourself to have worked with East Africa's Legends and Ethiopia's best talents. Ambassel, as an innovative production company, is the pioneer in producing Music videos and comedy shows on VCDs, Music videos, Movies on VCDs, Documentary films in Ethiopia. A few of our video productions are: 
Modern songs ranging from amateur singers to Tilahun Gessese, Cultural songs ranging from amateur to Baheru Kagne and Yirga Dubale, Ethnic and nationalities song ranging from amateur to Tadele Gemechu, 2 in 1, 3 in 1, 4 in 1 and various collections, Somali songs, Sudan songs, Instrumentals, Menzuma, Spiritual Orthodox songs,  Comedy songs.

visit www.ambassel.net for more!

name: Martie A Cooking ማርቲ ኤ
description:
Ethiopian foods are known for their tastes, looks and their delicious smell, bold, spicy, and savory flavors with plenty of options for meat and vegetarians (and vegans!) alike. There are no preservatives in Ethiopian cuisine, so almost most dishes are made fresh each day, and the way a restaurant prepares food is very similar to how families would make food at home. Popular dishes include Chicken stew called (Doro wot), Tibs (slices of beef pan-fried in onion and purified Ethiopian butter).  A distinctly Ethiopian blend of spices that might include cardamom, chili peppers, ginger, black pepper, and cinnamon),  
Ethiopian food is served on a large platter on injera, a sour, slightly spongy flatbread usually made from Teff, Ethiopian grain. Teff is packed with nutrients, a good source of protein, and is naturally gluten free.
Ethiopia is rich in it’s culture, tradition, natural resources, and has it’s unique food, which everyone in the world enjoy.
 Lots of love :)

name: WATCH BADBOY MOVIES
description:
እንኳን በደህና መጣችሁ!

ይሄ ቻናል ፊልሞችን በተሻለ መልኩ እንድትረዱ ለመርዳት ፤ ረዥም እና አሰልቺ የሆኑትን ደግሞ አጠር ባለ መልኩ ለማብራራት ታስቦ የተከፈተ ቻናል ነዉ።
  
አንዳንድ ግራ የሚያጋቡ ፊልሞችን ለመተንተን እና አስተላለቃቸዉ ላይ ያለዉን ትርጉምም የበለጠ ግልፅ ለማድረግ እንጥራለን። 

ባጠቃላይ በተቻለን አቅም በአጭሩ ሙሉ ፊልሙን ያያችሁት ያህል እስኪሰማቹ ድረስ ምንም ነገር ሳንዘል፣ ቀላል እና አዝናኝ በሆነ መንገድ ለመግለፅ እናንተንም ለማዝናናት እንሞክራለን።

Welcome to WATCH BADBOY MOVIES , the channel which's intended to help you better understand movies and save your time from the lengthy or even boring ones. 

We go through the whole movie commenting on every detail. At the end of the video, we like to explain some of the more confusing movies and what the ending may mean to us.  

Overall we try to explain the movies in the simplest ways we can while adding our input, and interesting facts. 

We love movies and here we explain and review movies in our own unique way to help you understand the movie better and not miss any important detail from it. 

Don't forget to subscribe!

name: EMBILTA TIGRAY
description:
Welcome to EMBILTA TIGRAY. The purpose of this youtube channel is to promote and educate  the culture and music of northern Ethiopia ( Tigray). Embilta Tigray aims to promote authentic content from traditional weddings, ceromonies, festivals, live music and other gatherings from Tigray, Ethiopia. 
Second purpose of Embilta Tigray is to educate Ethiopians all around the world on their culture. New generation Ethiopians born in the western world have lost their authentic culture. Therefore this channel will provide real event documented videos from the villages of Tigray in the northern Ethiopia.
Third Purpose of this channel is to promote new talents from Tigray, Ethiopia. There are a lot of talented musicians and dancers located in Tigray, Ethiopia, who have no facilities or are financially short that is not allowing them to further their talents. This youtube channel is here to create awareness and find possible sponsors and also help out by funding income gained on youtube.

name: Ethio Eskista
description:
Welcome to our vibrant world of Eskista dance! Our YouTube channel is your ultimate destination for everything related to this captivating and energetic traditional Ethiopian dance form.
Our channel is a celebration of the unique and dynamic dance style that has been passed down through generations, showcasing the diversity and beauty of Ethiopian culture.

Be prepared to be dazzled by our talented performers as they showcase their skillful footwork and intricate body movements.  You'll be transported to the heart of Ethiopia as you witness the joy, passion, and skill that go into every performance.

So join us on this incredible journey as we explore the vibrant world of Eskista dance, and let the rhythms of Ethiopia captivate your heart and soul. Hit that subscribe button and get ready to immerse yourself in the magic of Eskista dance!

Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or want to explore more about this incredible dance form.

name: DJ Dalion
description:
Hi... my name is David also known as DJ Dalion the name is in Patwa which is Jamaican language, The meaning is simple Da Lion or the Lion. although my descent is from Ethiopian and Eritrea, and i was born in Addis Ababa as a child I came to Sweden and I grew up in Sweden. 
My Education: In high school I studied hotel and restaurant, but at college I continued to study sound and video production. mostly I really loved to work with music. My interests in music have been there for as long as I can remember. I got my first keyboard from my mother when I was 13. as far as I remember it was the best gift I have ever received. At least before my children came to the earth anyway.
Today I work as a Disk Jokey (DJ), Sound Technician, Promoter, youtuber and program leader for EABC (East African Broadcast).
In addition, I also fight for human rights, especially women's and children's rights. this is a little description about me if you need to know more, do not be afraid to ask the question.

name: Bunna ቡና
description: Welcome to Bunna, a channel that blends personal development, mental health, entertainment, and coffee into one uplifting and inspiring experience. Our channel is inspired by the word "Bunna," which means coffee in Ethiopia, and is a tribute to the social and cultural importance of coffee in many parts of the world. Through our videos, we share practical tips and tools for personal growth and mental wellness, as well as engaging and entertaining content that is sure to make you smile. And of course, we do it all while enjoying a delicious cup of coffee. Join our community and let's explore the world of positive impact, and mental wellbeing, one cup of coffee at a time!"

name: Geez City
description:
We are a group of artists, music producers, songwriters, sound engineers, promoters, and DJs. 

Collectively, we have created a fresh, unique, and authentic urban sound in Tigrinya, Amharic, English, and more, across different urban genres like hip hop, afrobeat, amapiano, dancehall, soul, and R&B, infused with a touch of Eritrean and Ethiopian traditional instruments.

Our goal at Geez City is to put East African urban music on the international music market, which we call Geez Music.

We come from a part of the world that has a rich history, land, traditions, and beautiful cultures that are thousands of years old and still thriving. We are one of the few in this world that have our own alphabet letters called Ge'ez, which is a sign that a great civilization has existed in East Africa since ancient times. We are here to use music as a means to communicate love, African progress, and creativity within ourselves and with the world.

Much love from The Creative Collective - GEEZ CITY

name: VOA Tigrigna
description:
» ሳብስክራይ ድምጺ ኣሜሪካ ቋንቋ ትርግኛ: https://bit.ly/3u1DtWs
» ንተወሳኺ ቪድዮታት ንናይ ዩቲብ ቻነልና ተኸታተሉ: https://bit.ly/3e1Wcvz

ድምጺ ኣሜሪካ ሓደ ካብ ዓበይቲ ዓለምለኸ መሓውራት ዜና ኣሜሪካ ኮይኑ ዜናን ሓበሬታን ብ40 ቋንቋታት ን236.8 ሚልዮን ሰሙናዊ ሰማዕቲ ይበጽሕ:: ድምጺ ኣሜሪካ ትሕዝትኡ ብራድዮ: ቲቪን መርበብ ሓበሬታታትን ይዝርግሕ:: ትሕዝቶ ድምጺ ኣሜሪካ ብናይ ቴሌፎን ኣፕን ማሕበራዊ መራኸቢ ብዙሃንን’ውን ክርኸብ ይክኣል:: ብተወሳኺ ብሳተላይት: ብቴሌቭዥን  ማእከላይን ሓጺር ማዕበል ሬድዮ ይመሓላለፍ::

ድምጺ ኣሜሪካ ኣብ 1942 ዝምስረት ጀሚሩ ኩሉ መዓዝናዊ ሸፈነ ዘለዎ ሓቀኛ ሓበሬታ የመሓላልፍ:: ኣብ እዋን ካልኣይ ኹናት ዓለም:ዝሑል ኹናት: ኹናት ኣንጻር ግብረሽበራ ከምኡ’ውን ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ንዘሎ ቃልሲ ንናጽነት  ድምጺ ኣሜሪካ ኣብነት ናጽነት ፕረስ’ዩ::

ድምጺ ኣመሪካ ቋንቋ ትግርኛ መዓልታዊ ካብ 10:00-10:30  ወይ 4:00-4:30  ምሸት ብሬድዮ: ብሳተላይት: ብመርበብ ሓበሬታ: ፌስቡክን ዩቱብን ብቐጥታ ይፍነው::


» ንተወሳኺ ሓበሬታ መርበብ ሓበሬታና https://tigrigna.voanews.com/

name: የማንቂያ ደወል / Yemankiya Dewel
description:
Yemankiya Dewel is a privately held non-profit organization established in 2017 in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.

Yemankiya Dewel aims to promote Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahdo Church values globally. The much-needed information provided by Yemankiya Dewel would help bridge the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahdo Church followers narrow the communication gap for Ethiopians residing around the world. Yemankiya Dewel also envisions providing programs pertaining to teach God's Word, Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahdo Church Values, the rich religious heritage of Ethiopia, its history, tradition, and current affairs.

Subscribe and View our programs produced daily and weekly on our YouTube channel. 

For More information on the Yemankiya Dewel

Welcome to Talak Film  , the channel which's intended to help you better understand movies and save your time from the lengthy or even boring ones. 
We go through the whole movie commenting on every detail. At the end of the video, we like to explain some of the more confusing movies and what the ending may mean to us.  
Overall we try to explain the movies in the simplest ways we can while adding our input, and interesting facts. 
We love movies and here we explain and review movies in our own unique way to help you understand the movie better and not miss any important detail from it.

name: ahadu media
description:
Welcome to Ahadu podcast, the podcast that's all about helping young people develop the mindset, skills, and strategies they need to succeed in life, relationships, and business.
Join our host Kirubel, as he/she shares insights, interviews, and advice from successful young entrepreneurs, thought leaders, and experts in their fields.
In each episode, we explore topics such as cultivating a success mindset, building and scaling successful startups, developing healthy relationships, and navigating the unique challenges and opportunities that come with being a young person in today's world.
Whether you're a young entrepreneur looking to start your own business, a student trying to figure out your career path, or just someone who wants to achieve more in life, this podcast will provide you with the inspiration and guidance you need to succeed.
So tune in, and let's explore the mindset, success, relationships, and startups that will help you become the best version of yourself.

name: Rafatoel Initiative
description: The Rafatoel Initiative is a revolutionary concept, designed to present the contribution of past Ethiopian civilizations through proven and backed evidence, documented globally. Examining their contribution in medicine, architecture, art, literature social development and much more. A strong Web-based approach will be implemented to inspire and educate with the oath to bringing back the ancient Ethiopian civilizations and wisdoms.  The Initiative will encourage millions of people in Ethiopia to unlock the hidden and unexplained and mystifying past of Ethiopia, to learn and become the future changers of this great nation.  The Initiative will strategically use social and digital media outlets to discovering the past along with written documents and various public gatherings. Historical and fundamental analyses along with international expert commentary of a verity of topics on untold stories and occurrence’s which have yet been explained.

name: KUKU SEBSIBE
description: This is the official YouTube Channel of the legendary Ethiopian singer Kuku Sebsibe. Kuku Sebsibe was born in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia. She spent the majority of her education at Nazareth school and graduated from American Mission. Kuku's interest in music sprouted from a very young age. Since the age of nine, she used to entertain her classmates by mimicking all the popular artists of both Amharic and English music by using her lunch box as a drum. Her passion and love for music were nourished by her father, Dejazmach Sebsibe Shiberu's jam sessions at their home and his musical, peptic background. She lived in Washington, DC, United States for many years but moved back to Ethiopia c. 2003.

name: yone007
description:
.Ethiopia, an old country beyond all imaginations, has culture and traditions dating back over 3000 years. With over 80 different Ethnic groups with their own language, culture and traditions. The strong religious setting, celebrations and festivals play an important part in every ones daily life.
Church ceremonies are a major feature of Ethiopian life. The events are impressive and unique. The Ethiopian Orthodox Church has its own head, follows its own customs, and is extremely proud of its fourth century origins.

name: MERI PODCAST
description:
MERI is Ethiopian Business oriented Podcast hosted by Kenean and Tigabu. 

The entrepreneurship landscape in Ethiopia is growing and it needs a lot of content and local stories for others to learn from it and accelerate the growth of the ecosystem.

To that end 2 friends Kenean and Tigabu both Entrepreneurs themselves have launched MERI Podcast as a hobby to invite successful people to have conversations and create a platform to share their stories as well as entertain business table topics.

If you’re looking for inspiring stories and to join the club of changemakers make sure you tune in every Wednesday at 5 PM to MERI Podcast dedicated to Entrepreneurship and its Lifestyle.

name: Young OTC
description:
The Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo church is one of the oldest and apostolic churches present today. It is bathed in a rich heritage of beautiful worship, heavenly hymns and poetry. As it was wisely put by His Holiness Pope Shenouda (the late patriarch of our sister church, the Egyptian Orthodox Church) "A church without youth is a church without a future." And one youth once replied to H. H., "And youth without the church are youth without a future." And we refuse to be a generation that passively let its future come to an end!


We aim to spread the teachings & worship of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo faith in English and grow in our relationship with the Lord our savior and our GOD Jesus Christ.

description:
Teret Tereet Amharic is dedicated to present Amharic story videos.
Teret or ተረት (ተረት ተረት) is usually referring to  stories or story in amharic.
The literal meaning of teret teret or ተረት ተረት is story story, yes two times, and 
the reply from the audience will be "yelam beret" "የላም በረት" or shed. 
New Amharic Teret Teret will be uploaded everyweek. 
Inspirational or motivational thoughts will usually be added at the end of each video.
Get inspired!! Get Motivated!!
Nothing inappropriate will be uploaded in this channel, enjoy!!

እንኳን ወደ DTM Studio ቻናል በሰላም መጣችሁ። በዚህ ቻናል ላይ የተለያዩ ፈታ 😂 የሚያደርጉ Animation ቪዲዮችን እንለቃለን ። Like, subscribers እናም ሀሳብ አስተያየታቸውን Comment ላይ በመፃፍ ቤተሰብ ይሁኑ

name: Motivate 2 ethiopia
description:
Welcome to Motivate 2 ethiopia

ኢትዮጵያውያን ለመነሳሳት፣ህይወታቸውን ለመለወጥ እና ህልማቸውን ለማሳደድ ደፋር ለሆኑ ሰዎች ለመርዳት ጥራት ያላቸው ቪዲዮዎችን በማዘጋጀት ይለቀቅበታል
በዚህም አነሳሽና ህይወት ለዋጭ ቻናል ቤተሰብ በመሆን ይጠቀሙ  Motivate 2 Ethiopia 
ሰብስክራይብ ያድርጉ እናመሰግናለን

Motivate 2 ethiopia  is Ethiopian biggest and the best Motivational and Inspirational YouTube channel producing quality videos (In Amharic language) to help Ethiopians to be inspired, motivated through life for those that are courageous enough to take a stand towards changing their lives and chasing their dreams. Subscribe for daily videos

name: OROMIA DIGITAL MEDIA
description: Oromia Digital Media is an independent and voice for voiceless people in Ethiopia/Oromia. Our mission is to be voice for Oromo people and and citizens who had lost their right in Ethiopia/Oromia.
